org.princehouse.mica.base.net.model

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.princehouse.mica.base.net.model.Connection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseConnection, SimConnection

    public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Connections provide an implementation-independent mechanism for streaming data to/from a remote node.
